thread.title: Innovative council flash-flood alerts on the rise
thread.title_full: Innovative council flash-flood alerts on the rise

title: Innovative council flash-flood alerts on the rise
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Innovative council flash-flood alerts... Innovative council flash-flood alerts on the rise Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: The Age 
Many councils have flood-level and flow gauges in rivers and creeks. Technology means they can alert residents via mobile devices to rapidly rising water levels within three minutes. Start the conversation, or Read more at The Age.
